title: How do digital nomads organize and complete their taxes? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is a great question and one I get often! For that reason, I interviewed an IRS Enrolled Agent who specializes in US taxes for digital nomads. You can watch her interview here:  How to do Taxes for Digital Nomads There’s also another good video here on how to pay zero tax as a digital nomad:  Tax Breaks for Digital Nomads For non-US digital nomads who are doing their taxes, they should consult with a professional in their respective countries, noting that citizens of most countries can change their tax domicile (the country where they are taxed) depending on where they are living or have permanent residency. More info in this live stream below on digital nomad taxes:  The Top Misconceptions about Digital Nomad Taxes There can also be variations based on where/how they are employed and where they run their businesses. This is a broad topic, but for more specific questions, let me know!
